sections.description:
Try Easy Digital Downloads Signature Demo Here

Have you set up your page where your customers must sign a contract before they can buy and download the Easy Digital Downloads product you offer? You can make this go easier and smoother by using this plugin so that the contract is taken care of automatically whenever they purchase something. You don’t have to do a single thing.

Gather signatures automatically when customers buy downloads from the EDD online store with the Digital Signature for Easy Digital Downloads plugin and the [WP E-Signature] (https://www.approveme.com/easy-digital-downloads-signature-special/?utm_source=wprepo&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=easydigitaldownloads) business license.

And, that’s only the beginning. Once your customers sign, here’s what follows:

Both you and the customer gets a PDF copy of their signed contract immediately

There’s no need for an outside website (signatures happen on your site)

You get a 100 percent legally binding signature on file that protect you and the customers, based on the UETA/ESIGN rules)

This Digital Signature add-on transforms your Easy Digital Downloads store into a court-approved document signing application. Best of all, there are no monthly fees and it can be used as many times as you need it to. This is great for people who want to automate their collection of signatures for their various documents:

New client/customer contracts
Terms of service agreements
Waiver forms
So much more

*If customers want to download your product, the Easy Digital Downloads automatically require them to sign a legally binding contract.

“I agree to terms” checkboxes don’t have a lot of legal standing. Therefore, do the right thing for yourself by having a contract that’s legally binding in a court of law.

Change one page of your already-established WordPress website to become a secure document and e-signature application. ApproveMe’s WP E-Signature is a WordPress Contract Plugin that’s free to use with ease and is also legally binding in a court of law.

WP E-Signature has an all-encompassing e-signature first-class add-on library that includes an array of customizable and expandable e-signature automations to give your custom document the enhancement it needs. e-signature automations and third-party integrations

Do the smart thing. Don’t get caught in a courtroom with a document that’s not legally binding.

Strength & flexibility

WP E-Signature was created by way of back and front end WordPress, ensuring an easy-to-use plugin that’s both efficient and robust.

Legally Binding

The courts recognize WP E-Signatures. We are compliant to (UETA) and (ESIGN), making sure to follow even the strictest document signing policy in European unions and the U.S.

Electronic Signature Security and Encryption

Our biggest priority is security. Using a secure encryption, we make sure to keep all signed signatures and documents are keep encrypted and hidden. We also use a signer specific URL. You can force the SSL security when you install the SSL certificate on the WP E-Signature related pages.

Signer Audit Trail & Reporting

Documents are quickly moved from signer to signer. We also offer an in-depth audit report with IP addresses, viewer details, signer history and analytics. You can read all about the security of this report here.

Automation of WordPress Contracts & Document Signing

If you’ve got an Internet business, your customers probably sign an online contract or agreement. A paper agreement isn’t going to do you any good if you have an Internet business and your customers are online. Sure, you could mail or scan a contract to those customers. However, this will cost you both in time and money. This could also cost you business, as they decide to buy from somewhere else.

With WP E-Signature, you can customize the signing process for no fee. It also has array of add-on extensions – Dropbox Sync, Save as PDF and more – so that you can easily computerize and modify the document signing process.

WP Digital E-Signature is designed to work with all WordPress website including its themes. If you need assistance in the installation of the WordPress E-Signature, check out the getting started docs If you want your WordPress Proposals signed, we have everything you need.

Check out the official WP E-Signature Premium add-ons (https://www.approveme.com/wpesign-features/?utm_source=wprepo&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=easy-digital-downloads), if you want a customized WordPress eSigning integration or an add-on designed to be utilized for all your document signing needs. If any of the integrations you need are not available, give us a holler.

A third-party document signing service will charge you a monthly fee and it forces your customer to make an account on a separate website to get your website’s documents.

e-signature WordPress Features

WP E-Signature has everything you need to ensure you’re covered, regardless of what kind of business you own. Check out the WP E-Signature features on the ApproveMe website.

Customization

Since your business is unique, your document signing process needs to also be unique. Pick from any of the e-signature workflows (https://www.approveme.com/wpesign-features/?utm_source=wprepo&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=easy-digital-downloads) to host on your WordPress website.

Tablet & Smart Phone Friendly

You can uploaded documents through the WordPress dashboard and attain signatures of actual clients through your website with the ApproveMe WP E-Signature (https://www.approveme.com/easy-digital-downloads-signature-special/?utm_source=wprepo&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=easydigitaldownloads). Users can sign the online documents using their phone, tablet, trackpad and mouse.

No Monthly Fees

WP E-Signature is an affordable way to get the signatures you want online through WordPress. You retain complete control over the information you obtain, never leaving the server. This plug-in was built utterly for WordPress.

Do You Need Support?

In order to better serve you, and to make sure that support tickets don’t get lost, we do our best to provide you with world-class support through our website. There is no support offered on the wordpress.org forum.

In order to start a support ticket, you’ll need to log into your account. We will do everything we can to resolve the issue you have right away. www.approveme.com/support.

If you have questions that don’t pertain to support, we will gladly answer them for you. Just contact us through our contact page (https://approveme.com/letschat/?utm_source=wprepo&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=easy-digital-downloads).

How Does The Installation Process Work?

*It’s simple to set up the Easy Digital Downloads Digital Signatures add-on. Once you’ve attained a valid ApproveMe Elite or Lifetime license, you can come up with and attach legally binding, court-recognized contracts to any of the Easy Digital Downloads product or download. You can also set it up so that customers are required to sign the legal contract before they order your product. *

5 Steps To Use The Easy Digital Downloads WordPress Contract Plugin

Step 1:
Download and install the Easy Digital Downloads Digital Signature along with the WP E-Signature Elite or Lifetime license

Step 2:
Create a blank WordPress page that will hold your new document

Step 3:
Create a new Stand Alone Document that uses the WP e-Signature

Step 4:
Attach this document to both your Easy Digital Downloads download product and WordPress page

Step 5:
When users download a product that demands a digital signature in their cart, they’ll need to sign those documents before they finalize their checkout
sections.faq:
Will I be able to attain legally binding, court-recognized agreements from the Easy Digital Downloads plug in before somebody checks out?

The ApproveMe Easy Digital Downloads Digital Signature plugin as well as the WP E-Signature elite license makes it easy to attain UETA/ESIGN compliant signatures from customers before the finalization of their Easy Digital Downloads checkout.

What Makes The WP E-Signature Plugin Different From The Form Generation Plugin?

Form generation plugins are great, allowing you to make many automated integrations. Their primary focus isn’t a legally binding document. We focus solely on legally binding contracts. Many people make the false assumption that the addition of a signature add-on on their WordPress form is enough to make it an agreement legally binding. We took years coming up with a policy that adheres to strict ESIGN and UETA national and international document signing rules. The best thing you can do is not be caught in a court room with a contract that’s not legally binding document.

Are E-Signatures Legal?

Absolutely! Signatures that are obtained electronically or digitally are legally binding in the U.S. and throughout many nations around the world. There are two digital signatures acts in the U.S. that set the legality of these signatures. Both acts note that e-signatures and electronics records hold the same power as paper documents and handwritten signatures. According to both, a signature or document that’s on electronic form is still legal and enforceable.

These acts are the:

*[Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act] (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electronic_Signatures_in_Global_and_National_Commerce_Act) (ESIGN, 2000)
*[Uniform Electronic Transactions Act] (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uniform_Electronic_Transactions_Act) (UETA, 1999)

The ApproveMe WP E-Signature plugin is compliant with both acts

United Kingdom
The U.K. has legislation that’s similar to the U.S. ESIGN Act, which was enacted in 2000. It’s called the UK Electronic Communication Act. ApproveMe is the primary WordPress Plugin to sign contracts and demands an e-signature solution to be reliable with the act.

European Union
The adoption of the European Directive 1999/93/EC of Dec. 13, 1999 prove the use of electronic marks on digital and electronic contracts inside the EU. 30 European nations have formally adopted the Directive 1999/93/EC. Europe effectively uses the Digital and Electronic marks, and the ApproveMe WP E-Signature is compliant with Europe’s law and is enforceable in the EU.

Is there a need to for me to renew the ApproveMe License?

o Yes, you must renew the license, as it’s only good for one year from the date you purchased it. An active license key is a must for access to attain plugin support, critical and/or automatic updates and more. Go to e-signature add-on library. You can attain this license renewal for up to 50% off the current price.

I made my purchase so where do I obtain my license key?

If you’ve bought the license key and you still need to attain the license number, you have two routes you can go through: [support site here] (https://www.approveme.com/profile/) or these detailed steps. Once you’re logged into the support website, with the credentials we emailed to you when you bought our product, your active license key is located at the bottom of the page.

What does my “ApproveMe” license get me?

Your license gives you access to all of our support resources, documentation, product downloads and basic and advanced add-ons such as Document Templates, Stand Alone Documents, Unlimited Sender Roles and more (which are required for this Easy Digital Downloads e-signature Plugin) for one calendar year from the date of purchase.

How much will it cost to renew the license?

Within 60 days before your original license expiration date, you can renew the license for up to 50 percent off. It costs $98.50 for a current business license renewal. However, after the 60-day window, all renewals are done at full price. Renewals are not subjected to promotional discounts or coupon codes

What will I get for my license renewal?

When you renew your license, you get another years’ worth of software updates and support. You can rest assured that all you WP E-Signature-related needs and support. You continue to attain software updates to make sure all WordPress security and compatibility are properly taken care of. And, based on the license you choose, you can attain basic and advanced add-ons to download whenever you want.

If I have more questions, can I get help?

Whether you have one question or many, you can contact us via our contact page. contact form page.
